com.gmail.dengtao.joe.transport
Interface Acceptor

All Known Implementing Classes:
DatagramAcceptor, SocketAcceptor
public interface Acceptor

Accepts incoming connection, communicates with clients, and fires events to Handlers. Then events for incoming connections will be sent to the specified default Handler. Threads accept incoming connections start automatically when start() is invoked.

 ATTENTIONS:

 1.Before start() this Acceptor, you should call init() to initlize resources and setHandler(Handler) to set Handler for this Acceptor
 2.Thread will be blocked in start() method.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
DengTao
